comments.body:
Why not make the default be 
```suggestion
..  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
```

then we don't have to change most of the files?

The pre-commit plugin always adds space for non-empty license lines. It works well for all other cases but for .rst files it does not. I figured that it is better to change .rst files to adapt rather than customise the plugin. The benefit of the pre-commit is that it adds licences automatically and you do not have to even think about licenses any more once you start using it, so I think it is a small price to pay with once-off space offset for .rst files. I double-checked that it works fine when documentatio.n is generated.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@ .. Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
    or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
    distributed with this work for additional information

comments.body: This guide should be in a separate file, but this is another problem. Each module (* .py) with operators should have a separate guide and separate unit test file and separate system test and at least one example dag.
